Name: What's Left
About the game: What's Left is a retro styled action, adventure game with exploration, combat, intense set pieces, and a rich story focused cinematic experience. STORY Landon Ferngrass is a young boy struggling to make amends for his past mistakes. With the help of his shapeshifting friend, Picaro, they set forth to locate a magical artifact, called the Fire Pearl: which is believed to contain the same flame all souls are born from. Together they travel the globe, confront their demons, make new friends, reconcile with some old ones, overcome deadly threats, and are forced to face the harsh truths secrets are meant to protect us from.
Meta Title: What's Left: Jan 6, 2020, Ashes of Emerald and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on What's Left? Check out the release date (Jan 6, 2020), developer insights from Ashes of Emerald, and a complete game summary.
